description:
![logo](https://cdn.statically.io/img/media.moddb.com/images/mods/1/20/19741/DoomGuyStandingHD.jpg)
## This package
This package creates the necessary shortcuts for playing `BrutalDoom` with `SIGIL` megawad.

![logo](https://cdn.statically.io/img/doomwiki.org/w/images/3/32/SIGIL_title.png)
## Megawad info
The `SIGIL` Megawad is a mod for the original DOOM® and is distributed as such.

DOOM® is a registered trademark of ZeniMax Media Inc. in the US and/or other countries.

Id Software® is a registered trademark of ZeniMax Media Inc. in the US and/or other countries.

The `SIGIL` Megawad is in no way affiliated with ZeniMax Media Inc. or id Software LLC and is not approved by ZeniMax Media Inc. or id Software.
summary: SIGIL MegaWAD includes 5th Episodic pack of 9 levels
author: John Romero
